info.title: Plumsail Documents
info.description: Plumsail Documents connector allows you to set up automated document generation and conversion. The connector provides a wide range of actions to manipulate PDF documents and PDF forms. Create documents from templates, convert to PDF,  split and merge PDF files, protect them, read PDF forms, and more - all you need to automate documents in one connector. Find more information at https://plumsail.com/documents

processId.description: The name of process to be started

data.description: JSON data that should be applied to the template

locale.description: The locale that will be applyed to the document

html.description: Text HTML template or HTML file template

data.description: JSON data that should be applied to the template

locale.description: The locale that will be applyed to the document

data.description: JSON data that should be applied to the template

locale.description: The locale that will be applyed to the document

data.description: JSON data that should be applied to the template

locale.description: The locale that will be applyed to the document

delimiter.description: Delimiter of columns (by default it is just comma)

hasHeaderRecords.description: If set as "true" when headers will be read from a first line.

documentContent.description: Content of document that should be converted

resultFilesContents.description: The array of raw content of result files

documentContent.description: Content of document that should be converted

jsonData.description: The data that will be used to fill out the form

lockFormFields.description: Disable fields editing after filling them

html.description: HTML markup that should be converted to PDF

margins.description: The page margins. The syntax is the same as in CSS. Example: 25 50 75 100.

headerHtml.description: Only Classic engine - HTML markup that should be added as a header

footerHtml.description: Only Classic engine - HTML markup that should be added as a footer

documentsContents.description: The array of raw content of Docx documents

docxDocument.description: Raw content of docx document template. MergeField names should be the same as keys in template data

data.description: JSON data that should be applied to the template

documentsContents.description: The array of raw content of PDF documents

delimiter.description: Delimiter of columns (by default it is just comma)

headers.description: Comma separated list of headers in the same order as CSV columns

skipFirstLine.description: Select "Yes" if your CSV has headers as a first line.

startPage.description: The first page to start extraction (1 based)

pages.description: Page numbers for extraction separated by ';' (only this pages will be extracted)

format.description: The format of the result image

dpi.description: The resolution of the result image

startPage.description: The first page to start extraction (1 based)

documentContent.description: Content of document that should be converted
Content of document that should be converted

jsonContent.description: JSON data that should be applied to the template

allowPrinting.description: Protect the PDF file from being printed out

allowModification.description: Protect the PDF file from being edited

allowExtract.description: Allows extraction of text, images, and other media from the PDF file

allowAnnotate.description: Allows annotation (e.g. comments, form fill-in, signing) of the PDF file

newOwnerPassword.description: Enter an optional owner password here. This password can be used to disable document restrictions

newUserPassword.description: Enter an optional user password here. Each time an user opens the PDF he will be asked for this password. If you do not want a password prompt then leave this field blank

startPage.description: The first page to start split (1 based)

documentContent.description: Content of document that should be converted
Content of document that should be converted
